name: time_range_half_open
description: Validates that API time ranges follow the Half-Open approach as per ADR

conditions.message: An API with a time range MUST use the Half-Open approach. The start time is always inclusive while the end time is always exclusive.
The API documentation must clearly state that the start time is inclusive and the end time is exclusive to avoid ambiguity.
Time range parameters should follow naming conventions: startTime/endTime, fromDate/toDate, etc.
Time range parameters should use ISO8601 format for consistency.
